title: CNC Plasma Sign - Custom Logo
description: Custom logo sign cut via CNC plasma. Challenge: achieving clean edges on tight corners. Success: mastered lead/lag technique to prevent bevel cutting.

title: Metal Bracket - CNC Routed
description: Precision aluminum bracket with routed edges. Challenge: achieving exact tolerances. Success: zero-rework assembly with custom corner fixtures.

title: Steel Stand - TIG Welded
description: Heavy-duty welded stand for shop equipment. Challenge: perfect weld penetration without warping. Success: structural engineer inspection passed on first attempt.

title: Decorative Wall Panel - CNC Cut
description: Geometric pattern panel cut via CNC plasma. Challenge: cutting intricate designs without warping. Success: optimized torch speed and nesting strategy.
